Source code for Playground.Python_Staff.OOP.ovrloading.destructor

[docs]class Life:
    def __init__(self, name='unknown'):
        print('Welcome ', name)
        self.name = name

    def __del__(self):
        print('Goodbye ', self.name)



if __name__ == '__main__':
    brian = Life("Brian")
    brian2 = Life("Brian2")
